name: Baldi's And Learning REMASTERED!
description:
Oh Hi! Your just in time to play my first mod that is remade! but as you can see, it is much much better as it used to be in the old days. there are also going to be sequels to this mod so be more prepared!

now let's move on the story, shall we?

Story:

Oh great, your friend lost his... it's not his notebooks, it's actually his FRICKING BANANAS!!!!!! so your friend is dumb again. but he finished his eating practice and now he has HOMEWORK!!!!!! well you got back to your worst teacher's school Baldi,

yes, it is indeed Baldi. But something changed... let me tell you. Baldi was in a traffic jam Cuz he was so late to here school instead he went home and went to like walk over to here school. once he was halfway there, he saw an opposite version of himself. it shook the whole world and started to take over baldi's school. Baldi on the over hand started to run away and never come back. you don't even know what happened

to baldi's friends. so, the only thing you need to do is collect 7 bananas and escape the school as possible.
